content:
ICS 8 - Introduction to Computer Security Homework 3, 50 Points
Due: Tuesday, October 19, 2010, at the beginnning of class

  1. Problem R-3.1 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  2. Problem R-3.3 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  3. Problem R-3.9 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  4. Problem R-3.10 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  5. Problem R-3.12 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  6. Problem R-3.15 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 5 points.
  7. Problem C-3.2 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 10 points.
  8. Problem C-3.4 from Chapter 3, Goodrich-Tamassia, Intro. to Computer Security, 10 points.
Please write no more than a single paragraph for an answer to any R- or C-question. In many cases, a single sentence could be sufficient.
